recommendations.message: Critical data sources are missing. Check MSK integration configuration.
Some data sources have stale data (>5 minutes old).
details: Check polling intervals and network connectivity

query.name: Cluster Sample Data Exists
query.query: SELECT count(*) FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: All Cluster Metrics Present
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(provider.activeControllerCount.Sum) as 'Has Active Controller Count',
          count(provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum) as 'Has Offline Partitions Count',
          count(provider.globalPartitionCount.Average) as 'Has Global Partition Count'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(provider.activeControllerCount.Sum) as 'Has Active Controller Count',
          count(provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum) as 'Has Offline Partitions Count',
          count(provider.globalPartitionCount.Average) as 'Has Global Partition Count'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Broker Sample Data Exists
query.query: SELECT count(*) FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: All Broker Metrics Present
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Has Bytes In',
          count(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Has Bytes Out',
          count(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Has Messages In',
          count(provider.messagesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Has Messages Out'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Has Bytes In',
          count(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Has Bytes Out',
          count(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Has Messages In',
          count(provider.messagesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Has Messages Out'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Topic Sample Data Exists
query.query: SELECT count(*) FROM AwsMskTopicSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM AwsMskTopicSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Topic Metrics Present
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(provider.bytesInPerSec.Sum) as 'Has Bytes In',
          count(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Sum) as 'Has Bytes Out'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(provider.bytesInPerSec.Sum) as 'Has Bytes In',
          count(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Sum) as 'Has Bytes Out'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Cluster Attributes Present
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(provider.clusterName) as 'Has Cluster Name',
          count(entity.guid) as 'Has Entity GUID',
          count(entityName) as 'Has Entity Name'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(provider.clusterName) as 'Has Cluster Name',
          count(entity.guid) as 'Has Entity GUID',
          count(entityName) as 'Has Entity Name'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Broker Attributes Present
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(provider.clusterName) as 'Has Cluster Name',
          count(provider.brokerId) as 'Has Broker ID',
          count(entity.guid) as 'Has Entity GUID'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(provider.clusterName) as 'Has Cluster Name',
          count(provider.brokerId) as 'Has Broker ID',
          count(entity.guid) as 'Has Entity GUID'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Topic Attributes Present
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(provider.topic) as 'Has Topic Name',
          count(displayName) as 'Has Display Name',
          count(entity.guid) as 'Has Entity GUID'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(provider.topic) as 'Has Topic Name',
          count(displayName) as 'Has Display Name',
          count(entity.guid) as 'Has Entity GUID'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Metric Events Exist
query.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Metric WHERE metricName LIKE 'newrelic.goldenmetrics%' OR metricName LIKE 'kafka%' SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Metric WHERE metricName LIKE 'newrelic.goldenmetrics%' OR metricName LIKE 'kafka%' SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Cluster-Level Metrics
query.query:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.ActiveControllerCount') as 'Active Controller',
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.OfflinePartitionsCount') as 'Offline Partitions',
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.GlobalPartitionCount') as 'Global Partitions'
        FROM Metric WHERE metricName LIKE 'aws.kafka%' SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.ActiveControllerCount') as 'Active Controller',
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.OfflinePartitionsCount') as 'Offline Partitions',
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.GlobalPartitionCount') as 'Global Partitions'
        FROM Metric WHERE metricName LIKE 'aws.kafka%' SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Broker-Level Metrics
query.query:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.BytesInPerSec.byBroker') as 'Broker Bytes In',
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.BytesOutPerSec.byBroker') as 'Broker Bytes Out',
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.UnderReplicatedPartitions') as 'Under Replicated'
        FROM Metric WHERE metricName LIKE 'aws.kafka%' SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.BytesInPerSec.byBroker') as 'Broker Bytes In',
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.BytesOutPerSec.byBroker') as 'Broker Bytes Out',
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.UnderReplicatedPartitions') as 'Under Replicated'
        FROM Metric WHERE metricName LIKE 'aws.kafka%' SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Topic-Level Metrics
query.query:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.BytesInPerSec.byTopic') as 'Topic Bytes In',
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.BytesOutPerSec.byTopic') as 'Topic Bytes Out'
        FROM Metric WHERE metricName LIKE 'aws.kafka%' SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.BytesInPerSec.byTopic') as 'Topic Bytes In',
          filter(count(*), WHERE metricName = 'aws.kafka.BytesOutPerSec.byTopic') as 'Topic Bytes Out'
        FROM Metric WHERE metricName LIKE 'aws.kafka%' SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Metric Streams Attributes
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(aws.kafka.ClusterName OR aws.msk.clusterName) as 'Has Cluster Name',
          count(aws.kafka.BrokerID OR aws.msk.brokerId) as 'Has Broker ID',
          count(aws.kafka.Topic OR aws.msk.topic) as 'Has Topic Name'
        FROM Metric WHERE metricName LIKE 'aws.kafka%' SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(aws.kafka.ClusterName OR aws.msk.clusterName) as 'Has Cluster Name',
          count(aws.kafka.BrokerID OR aws.msk.brokerId) as 'Has Broker ID',
          count(aws.kafka.Topic OR aws.msk.topic) as 'Has Topic Name'
        FROM Metric WHERE metricName LIKE 'aws.kafka%' SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Broker Sample Data
query.query: SELECT count(*) FROM KafkaBrokerSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM KafkaBrokerSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Topic Sample Data
query.query: SELECT count(*) FROM KafkaTopicSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM KafkaTopicSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Offset Sample Data
query.query: SELECT count(*) FROM KafkaOffsetSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM KafkaOffsetSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Producer Sample Data
query.query: SELECT count(*) FROM KafkaProducerSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM KafkaProducerSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Consumer Sample Data
query.query: SELECT count(*) FROM KafkaConsumerSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM KafkaConsumerSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Check for Null Values
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Records',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.activeControllerCount.Sum IS NULL) as 'Null Active Controllers',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum IS NULL) as 'Null Offline Partitions',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.clusterName IS NULL) as 'Null Cluster Names'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Records',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.activeControllerCount.Sum IS NULL) as 'Null Active Controllers',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum IS NULL) as 'Null Offline Partitions',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.clusterName IS NULL) as 'Null Cluster Names'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Data Freshness (Polling)
query.query:
SELECT 
          latest(timestamp) as 'Last Data Point',
          (now() - latest(timestamp))/1000 as 'Age in Seconds'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          latest(timestamp) as 'Last Data Point',
          (now() - latest(timestamp))/1000 as 'Age in Seconds'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Data Freshness (Metric Streams)
query.query:
SELECT 
          latest(timestamp) as 'Last Data Point',
          (now() - latest(timestamp))/1000 as 'Age in Seconds',
          count(*) as 'Total Metric Points'
        FROM Metric 
        WHERE metricName LIKE 'newrelic.goldenmetrics.infra.kafkabroker%'
        FACET entity.name
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          latest(timestamp) as 'Last Data Point',
          (now() - latest(timestamp))/1000 as 'Age in Seconds',
          count(*) as 'Total Metric Points'
        FROM Metric 
        WHERE metricName LIKE 'newrelic.goldenmetrics.infra.kafkabroker%'
        FACET entity.name
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Tag Completeness
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Records',
          filter(count(*), WHERE environment IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Environment Tag',
          filter(count(*), WHERE label.env IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Environment Label',
          filter(count(*), WHERE label.cluster IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Cluster Label',
          filter(count(*), WHERE label.integration IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Integration Label'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Records',
          filter(count(*), WHERE environment IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Environment Tag',
          filter(count(*), WHERE label.env IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Environment Label',
          filter(count(*), WHERE label.cluster IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Cluster Label',
          filter(count(*), WHERE label.integration IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Integration Label'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Data Consistency Check
query.query: SELECT uniqueCount(provider.clusterName) as `Clusters in ClusterSample` FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(provider.clusterName) as `Clusters in ClusterSample` FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Cluster Throughput Summary
query.query:
SELECT 
          sum(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Total Bytes In/Sec',
          sum(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Total Bytes Out/Sec',
          sum(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Total Messages In/Sec'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          sum(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Total Bytes In/Sec',
          sum(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Total Bytes Out/Sec',
          sum(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Total Messages In/Sec'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Throughput Aggregation
query.query:
SELECT sum(bytesInPerSec) as 'Total Incoming', sum(bytesOutPerSec) as 'Total Outgoing'
        FROM (
          SELECT average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'bytesInPerSec',
                 average(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'bytesOutPerSec'
          FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
          FACET provider.clusterName as cluster, provider.brokerId
          LIMIT MAX
        ) SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT sum(bytesInPerSec) as 'Total Incoming', sum(bytesOutPerSec) as 'Total Outgoing'
        FROM (
          SELECT average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'bytesInPerSec',
                 average(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'bytesOutPerSec'
          FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
          FACET provider.clusterName as cluster, provider.brokerId
          LIMIT MAX
        ) SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Topic Throughput
query.query:
SELECT 
          latest(provider.bytesInPerSec.Sum) OR 0 AS 'Bytes In/Sec',
          latest(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Sum) OR 0 AS 'Bytes Out/Sec'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        FACET displayName
        SINCE {timeRange}
        LIMIT 10

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          latest(provider.bytesInPerSec.Sum) OR 0 AS 'Bytes In/Sec',
          latest(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Sum) OR 0 AS 'Bytes Out/Sec'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        FACET displayName
        SINCE 1 hour ago
        LIMIT 10

query.name: Message Rates
query.query:
SELECT sum(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Total Messages In'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT sum(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Total Messages In'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Brokers per Cluster
query.query:
SELECT uniqueCount(provider.brokerId) as 'Broker Count'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT uniqueCount(provider.brokerId) as 'Broker Count'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Topics per Cluster
query.query:
SELECT uniqueCount(displayName) as 'Topic Count'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT uniqueCount(displayName) as 'Topic Count'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Entity GUIDs Present
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(entity.guid) as 'Total Entity GUIDs',
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Unique Entity GUIDs'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(entity.guid) as 'Total Entity GUIDs',
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Unique Entity GUIDs'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Cluster Health Status
query.query:
SELECT 
          latest(provider.activeControllerCount.Sum) as 'Active Controllers',
          latest(provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum) as 'Offline Partitions'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          latest(provider.activeControllerCount.Sum) as 'Active Controllers',
          latest(provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum) as 'Offline Partitions'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Broker Health Status
query.query:
SELECT 
          latest(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Bytes In Rate',
          latest(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Bytes Out Rate',
          latest(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Message Rate'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        FACET provider.clusterName, provider.brokerId
        SINCE {timeRange}
        LIMIT 20

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          latest(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Bytes In Rate',
          latest(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Bytes Out Rate',
          latest(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Message Rate'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        FACET provider.clusterName, provider.brokerId
        SINCE 1 hour ago
        LIMIT 20

query.name: Unhealthy Cluster Count
query.query:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Total',
          filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) as 'Unhealthy'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Total',
          filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) as 'Unhealthy'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Throughput Time Series
query.query:
SELECT sum(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Incoming Throughput'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        TIMESERIES 5 minutes
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT sum(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Incoming Throughput'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        TIMESERIES 5 minutes
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Message Rate Time Series
query.query:
SELECT sum(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Message Rate'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        TIMESERIES 5 minutes
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT sum(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Message Rate'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        TIMESERIES 5 minutes
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Partition Count Trend
query.query:
SELECT average(provider.globalPartitionCount.Average) as 'Partitions'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample
        TIMESERIES 10 minutes
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT average(provider.globalPartitionCount.Average) as 'Partitions'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample
        TIMESERIES 10 minutes
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Account Summary
query.query:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Cluster Count',
          uniqueCount(provider.clusterName) as 'Named Cluster Count'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Cluster Count',
          uniqueCount(provider.clusterName) as 'Named Cluster Count'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Account Health Summary
query.query:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Total Clusters',
          filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) as 'Unhealthy Clusters'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Total Clusters',
          filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) as 'Unhealthy Clusters'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Data Volume Check
query.query:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskClusterSample') as 'Cluster Events',
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskBrokerSample') as 'Broker Events',
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskTopicSample') as 'Topic Events'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample, AwsMskBrokerSample, AwsMskTopicSample
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskClusterSample') as 'Cluster Events',
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskBrokerSample') as 'Broker Events',
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskTopicSample') as 'Topic Events'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample, AwsMskBrokerSample, AwsMskTopicSample
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Large Dataset Check
query.query:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(displayName) as 'Topic Count',
          count(*) as 'Total Events'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}
        LIMIT 5

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(displayName) as 'Topic Count',
          count(*) as 'Total Events'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago
        LIMIT 5

query.name: Idle Topics
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Topics',
          average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Sum) as 'Avg Bytes In',
          average(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Sum) as 'Avg Bytes Out'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Topics',
          average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Sum) as 'Avg Bytes In',
          average(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Sum) as 'Avg Bytes Out'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Stale Data Detection
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Samples',
          max(timestamp) as 'Latest Timestamp',
          min(timestamp) as 'Earliest Timestamp'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Samples',
          max(timestamp) as 'Latest Timestamp',
          min(timestamp) as 'Earliest Timestamp'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Partial Data Check
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Topics',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.bytesInPerSec.Sum IS NULL) as 'Missing Bytes In',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.bytesOutPerSec.Sum IS NULL) as 'Missing Bytes Out'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Topics',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.bytesInPerSec.Sum IS NULL) as 'Missing Bytes In',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.bytesOutPerSec.Sum IS NULL) as 'Missing Bytes Out'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Top 10 Topics by Throughput
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Sample Count',
          average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Sum) as 'Avg Bytes In'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        FACET displayName
        SINCE {timeRange}
        LIMIT 10

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Sample Count',
          average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Sum) as 'Avg Bytes In'
        FROM AwsMskTopicSample
        FACET displayName
        SINCE 1 hour ago
        LIMIT 10

query.name: Top 5 Clusters by Size
query.query:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(provider.brokerId) as 'Broker Count',
          uniqueCount(displayName) as 'Topic Count'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample, AwsMskTopicSample
        WHERE provider.clusterName IS NOT NULL
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}
        LIMIT 5

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(provider.brokerId) as 'Broker Count',
          uniqueCount(displayName) as 'Topic Count'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample, AwsMskTopicSample
        WHERE provider.clusterName IS NOT NULL
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago
        LIMIT 5

query.name: Common Throughput Pattern
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Has Bytes In',
          count(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Has Bytes Out'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Has Bytes In',
          count(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Has Bytes Out'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Common Message Pattern
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Has Messages In',
          count(provider.messagesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Has Messages Out'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Has Messages In',
          count(provider.messagesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Has Messages Out'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Available Clusters
query.query: SELECT count(*) as `Total Samples` FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) as `Total Samples` FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Available Topics
query.query: SELECT count(*) as `Total Samples` FROM AwsMskTopicSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql: SELECT count(*) as `Total Samples` FROM AwsMskTopicSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Throughput Range
query.query:
SELECT 
          min(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Min Throughput',
          max(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Max Throughput',
          average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Avg Throughput'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          min(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Min Throughput',
          max(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Max Throughput',
          average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Avg Throughput'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Percentage Calculations
query.query:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Total',
          filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) as 'Unhealthy',
          100.0 * filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) / uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Unhealthy %'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Total',
          filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) as 'Unhealthy',
          100.0 * filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) / uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Unhealthy %'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Complete Data Check
query.query:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskClusterSample') as 'Has Cluster Data',
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskBrokerSample') as 'Has Broker Data',
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskTopicSample') as 'Has Topic Data',
          min(timestamp) as 'Oldest Data',
          max(timestamp) as 'Newest Data',
          max(timestamp) as 'Newest Data'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample, AwsMskBrokerSample, AwsMskTopicSample
        SINCE {timeRange}

queries.nrql:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskClusterSample') as 'Has Cluster Data',
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskBrokerSample') as 'Has Broker Data',
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskTopicSample') as 'Has Topic Data',
          min(timestamp) as 'Oldest Data',
          max(timestamp) as 'Newest Data',
          max(timestamp) as 'Newest Data'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample, AwsMskBrokerSample, AwsMskTopicSample
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.query:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Records',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.activeControllerCount.Sum IS NULL) as 'Null Active Controllers',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum IS NULL) as 'Null Offline Partitions',
          filter(count(*), WHERE provider.clusterName IS NULL) as 'Null Cluster Names'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        SINCE {timeRange}

details.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Records',

        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Data Freshness (Polling)
query.query:
SELECT 
          latest(timestamp) as 'Last Data Point',
          (now() - latest(timestamp))/1000 as 'Age in Seconds'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

details.nrql:
SELECT 
          latest(timestamp) as 'Last Data Point',
          (now() - latest(timestamp))/1000 as 'Age in Seconds'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Data Freshness (Metric Streams)
query.query:
SELECT 
          latest(timestamp) as 'Last Data Point',
          (now() - latest(timestamp))/1000 as 'Age in Seconds',
          count(*) as 'Total Metric Points'
        FROM Metric 
        WHERE metricName LIKE 'newrelic.goldenmetrics.infra.kafkabroker%'
        FACET entity.name
        SINCE {timeRange}

details.nrql:
SELECT 
          latest(timestamp) as 'Last Data Point',
          (now() - latest(timestamp))/1000 as 'Age in Seconds',
          count(*) as 'Total Metric Points'
        FROM Metric 
        WHERE metricName LIKE 'newrelic.goldenmetrics.infra.kafkabroker%'
        FACET entity.name
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Tag Completeness
query.query:
SELECT 
          count(*) as 'Total Records',
          filter(count(*), WHERE environment IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Environment Tag',
          filter(count(*), WHERE label.env IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Environment Label',
          filter(count(*), WHERE label.cluster IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Cluster Label',
          filter(count(*), WHERE label.integration IS NOT NULL) as 'Has Integration Label'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

SELECT

query.name: Cluster Throughput Summary
query.query:
SELECT 
          sum(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Total Bytes In/Sec',
          sum(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Total Bytes Out/Sec',
          sum(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Total Messages In/Sec'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

details.nrql:
SELECT 
          sum(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Total Bytes In/Sec',
          sum(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Total Bytes Out/Sec',
          sum(provider.messagesInPerSec.Average) as 'Total Messages In/Sec'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample 
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Throughput Aggregation
query.query:
SELECT sum(bytesInPerSec) as 'Total Incoming', sum(bytesOutPerSec) as 'Total Outgoing'
        FROM (
          SELECT average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'bytesInPerSec',
                 average(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'bytesOutPerSec'
          FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
          FACET provider.clusterName as cluster, provider.brokerId
          LIMIT MAX
        ) SINCE {timeRange}

details.nrql:
SELECT sum(bytesInPerSec) as 'Total Incoming', sum(bytesOutPerSec) as 'Total Outgoing'
        FROM (
          SELECT average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'bytesInPerSec',
                 average(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'bytesOutPerSec'
          FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
          FACET provider.clusterName as cluster, provider.brokerId
          LIMIT MAX
        ) SINCE 1 hour ago

        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE {timeRange}

details.nrql:
SELECT 
          count(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Has Bytes In',
          count(provider.bytesOutPerSec.Average) as 'Has Bytes Out'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE 1 hour ago

        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample SINCE {timeRange}

query.name: Throughput Range
query.query:
SELECT 
          min(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Min Throughput',
          max(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Max Throughput',
          average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Avg Throughput'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE {timeRange}

details.nrql:
SELECT 
          min(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Min Throughput',
          max(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Max Throughput',
          average(provider.bytesInPerSec.Average) as 'Avg Throughput'
        FROM AwsMskBrokerSample
        FACET provider.clusterName
        SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Percentage Calculations
query.query:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Total',
          filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) as 'Unhealthy',
          100.0 * filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) / uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Unhealthy %'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE {timeRange}

details.nrql:
SELECT 
          uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Total',
          filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) as 'Unhealthy',
          100.0 * filter(uniqueCount(entity.guid), WHERE provider.offlinePartitionsCount.Sum > 0) / uniqueCount(entity.guid) as 'Unhealthy %'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample SINCE 1 hour ago

query.name: Complete Data Check
query.query:
SELECT 
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskClusterSample') as 'Has Cluster Data',
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskBrokerSample') as 'Has Broker Data',
          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskTopicSample') as 'Has Topic Data',
          min(timestamp) as 'Oldest Data',
          max(timestamp) as 'Newest Data',
          max(timestamp) as 'Newest Data'
        FROM AwsMskClusterSample, AwsMskBrokerSample, AwsMskTopicSample
        SINCE {timeRange}

details.nrql:

          filter(count(*), WHERE eventType() = 'AwsMskClusterSample') as 'Has Cluster Data',

        SINCE 1 hour ago
